text: Escape from Red Rock is a 1957 American western movie directed by Edward Bernds and starring Brian Donlevy, Eilene Janssen, Jay C. Flippen, William Edward Phipps, Myron Healey, Dan White, Zon Murray, Frank Marlowe. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Edward Bernds
title: Escape from Red Rock
